note.p: Career: Physician, Bengal Medical Service, HEIC; Superintendent, Botanic Garden, Saharunpur (before 1845)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1866-1867 vol 15 pp xiv-xx
References: Joyce Brown, 'A Memoir of Colonel Sir Proby Cautley, FRS, 1802-1871, Engineer and Palaeontologist' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 185-225
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
